prints.title: RADIO PROGRAMS SCHEDULED FOR THE CURRENT WEEK New York

synopses.synopsis: Crime Classics grew out of a long-standing and deep interest of actor-director Elliott Lewis in history's great murder cases. Lewis had compiled an extensive library of true crime cases, often primary source material dating from the 17th century... - On the Air: The Encyclopedia of Old-Time Radio by John Dunning
